snippet: Michel Platini is seen as soccer's president-elect, a man who has declared himself "incorruptible," but his support of Qatar's World Cup bid and his close ties to the country have raised questions.
abstract: Michel Platini is seen as soccer's president-elect, a man who has declared himself "incorruptible," but his support of Qatar's World Cup bid and his close ties to the country have raised questions.

headline.main: Assessing the Heir to Soccer's Throne
